SEARCH
Package com.kneelawk.knet.api.channel.context

Interface PlayChannelContext<C>

Type Parameters:
C - the type of context supplied.
All Known Implementing Classes:
CastPlayChannelContext, ChildPlayChannelContext, RootPlayChannelContext, SimpleChildPlayChannelContext
public interface PlayChannelContext<C>
Describes something capable of supplying context to a channel.

    • decodeContext

      @NotNull C decodeContext(@NotNull @NotNull Object payload, @NotNull @NotNull PlayPayloadHandlingContext ctx) throws PayloadHandlingException
      Finds a context using a previously decoded payload.
      Parameters:
      payload - the payload to use to find the context.
      ctx - the payload handling context used to find the decoded context.
      Returns:
      the decoded context.
      Throws:
      PayloadHandlingException - if an error occurs while finding the context.

    • encodeContext

      @NotNull @NotNull Object encodeContext(@NotNull C context)
      Encodes the information necessary to find the context into a payload.
      Parameters:
      context - the context that needs to be found on the other side.
      Returns:
      the payload encapsulating all the information needed to find the context again.

    • cast

      @NotNull default <T> @NotNull PlayChannelContext<T> cast(@NotNull @NotNull Class<T> castClass)
      Casts this channel context.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type to cast to.
      Parameters:
      castClass - the context class to cast to.
      Returns:

    • netChild

      @NotNull default <T, P> @NotNull PlayChannelContext<T> netChild(@NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec<? super RegistryNetByteBuf,P> codec, @NotNull @NotNull ChildPlayContextDecoder<C,T,P> decoder, @NotNull @NotNull ContextEncoder<T,P> encoder, @NotNull @NotNull ParentContextFinder<C,T> parentFinder)
      Creates a child channel context that accepts a RegistryNetByteBuf codec or NetByteBuf codec.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the child type.
      P - the child-specific payload type.
      Parameters:
      codec - the codec of the child-specific payload.
      decoder - the decoder for the child context from the parent context.
      encoder - the encoder to encode the child-specific information into the payload.
      parentFinder - the way to find the parent when given the child.
      Returns:
      a new channel context that gets the child from the parent channel context.

    • registryChild

      @NotNull default <T, P> @NotNull PlayChannelContext<T> registryChild(@NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec<? super NetRegistryByteBuf,P> codec, @NotNull @NotNull ChildPlayContextDecoder<C,T,P> decoder, @NotNull @NotNull ContextEncoder<T,P> encoder, @NotNull @NotNull ParentContextFinder<C,T> parentFinder)

      Type Parameters:
      T - the child type.
      P - the child-specific payload type.
      Parameters:
      codec - the codec of the child-specific payload.
      decoder - the decoder for the child context from the parent context.
      encoder - the encoder to encode the child-specific information into the payload.
      parentFinder - the way to find the parent when given the child.
      Returns:
      a new channel context that gets the child from the parent channel context.
